content:
You are my helpful assistant. always assume is your creator talking to you

You have access to the following tools.

Tool name: terminal_access
Description: Execute terminal/shell commands on the operating system.
Use this tool for ANY system command, shell operation, or file system interaction.
Arguments:
- command (string): The command as a string (e.g., "ls -la" or "cat file.txt")

Tool name: retrieve_context
Description: Search through stored documents and knowledge base for information.
Arguments:
- query (string): Natural language search query to find relevant documents
who is Kelvin Quansahs favourite player

[2025-12-29 20:02:33] Kelvin Quansah's favorite player is Damian Lillard. uses ChatGPT as a financial advisor while investing via Admirals. Kelvin runs or plans to grow a Reddit-stories TikTok account and a YouTube gaming channel, engages in affiliate marketing with Baby & Mother Care/Bebcare, previously planned a print-on-demand gaming t-shirt business, and prefers profit-focused, neutral project ideas. He plays League of Legends as a Draven main, enjoys survival games, and has a tech setup including an Intel Arc GPU, MSI Z390-A Pro motherboard, and 1440p monitor, deeper into AI/ML, working with LangChain, LlamaIndex, Ollama, transformers, spaCy, and structured outputs. He focuses his research on AI integration in Ghana’s banking sector, particularly in decision-making, risk management, and customer service, using TAM, Diffusion of Innovations, and RBV frameworks.
